@lc in anchient Chinese they use characters that sound the same to avoid calling certain people like the emperor by name
It's a respect thing
In ancient China, children are not sop posed to say or write their parents' name directly. It is disrespectful. So when u write that same cha
Change to make it different. U r not supposed to pronounce those characters as they truly are either.
These are opposite as the westerners do. U guys like to honor ur parents by using their names for ur or ur children.
